mapper.sql: purchase_id, commodity, is_agree, supplier, quantity, amount_money, payment_method, is_pay, has_take_goods, operator, purchase_time,classify
mapper.select: SELECT purchase_id AS purchaseId, commodity, is_agree AS isAgree, supplier, quantity, amount_money AS amountMoney , payment_method AS paymentMethod, is_pay AS isPay, has_take_goods AS hasTakeGoods, operator, purchase_time AS purchaseTime,classify FROM purchase

distinct
from purchase
order by ${orderByClause}

#{purchaseId}
mapper.insert: insert into purchase (purchase_id, commodity, is_agree, supplier, quantity, amount_money, payment_method, is_pay, has_take_goods, operator, purchase_time,classify) values (#{purchaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commodity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAgree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amountMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, #{paymentMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isPay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hasTakeGoods,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{classify,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update purchase
purchase_id = #{record.purchaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
commodity = #{record.commodity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_agree = #{record.isAgree,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supplier = #{record.supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity = #{record.quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount_money = #{record.amountMoney,jdbcType=REAL},
payment_method = #{record.paymentMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_pay = #{record.isPay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
has_take_goods = #{record.hasTakeGoods,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{record.operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purchase_time = #{record.purchaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
purchase_time = #{record.classify,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update purchase set purchase_id = #{record.purchaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commodity = #{record.commodity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_agree = #{record.isAgree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supplier = #{record.supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity = #{record.quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount_money = #{record.amountMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, payment_method = #{record.paymentMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_pay = #{record.isPay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, has_take_goods = #{record.hasTakeGoods,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{record.operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_time = #{record.purchaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, classify=#{record.classify.jdbcType=INTEGER}

update purchase
commodity = #{commodity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_agree = #{isAgree,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supplier = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount_money = #{amountMoney,jdbcType=REAL},
payment_method = #{paymentMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_pay = #{isPay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
has_take_goods = #{hasTakeGoods,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purchase_time = #{purchaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
classify= #{classify,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where purchase_id = #{purchaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update purchase set commodity = #{commodity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_agree = #{isAgree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supplier = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount_money = #{amountMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, payment_method = #{paymentMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_pay = #{isPay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, has_take_goods = #{hasTakeGoods,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_time = #{purchaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},classify=#{classify,jdbcType=INTEGER} where purchase_id = #{purchaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE purchase SET commodity=#{commodity}, supplier=#{supplier}, quantity=#{quantity}, amount_money=#{amountMoney}, payment_method=#{paymentMethod}, has_take_goods=#{hasTakeGoods}, purchase_time=#{purchaseTime},classify=#{classify} WHERE purchase_id=#{purchaseId}
mapper.select: SELECT purchase_id AS purchaseId, commodity, is_agree AS isAgree, supplier, quantity, amount_money AS amountMoney, payment_method AS paymentMethod, is_pay AS isPay, has_take_goods AS hasTakeGoods, operator, purchase_time AS purchaseTime,classify FROM purchase WHERE has_take_goods=#{hasTakeGoods} AND is_agree=#{isAgree}

SELECT purchase_id AS purchaseId, commodity, is_agree AS isAgree, supplier, quantity, amount_money AS amountMoney, payment_method AS paymentMethod, is_pay AS isPay, has_take_goods AS hasTakeGoods, operator, purchase_time AS purchaseTime,classify FROM purchase WHERE purchase.purchase_id NOT IN (SELECT purchase_id FROM t_stock) AND purchase.has_take_goods=#{hasTakeGoods} AND purchase.is_agree=#{isAgree}

SELECT purchase_id AS purchaseId, commodity, is_agree AS isAgree, supplier, quantity, amount_money AS amountMoney, payment_method AS paymentMethod, is_pay AS isPay, has_take_goods AS hasTakeGoods, operator, purchase_time AS purchaseTime,classify FROM purchase WHERE is_agree=#{isAgree}

SELECT purchase_id AS purchaseId, commodity, is_agree AS isAgree, supplier, quantity, amount_money AS amountMoney, payment_method AS paymentMethod, is_pay AS isPay, has_take_goods AS hasTakeGoods, operator, purchase_time AS purchaseTime,classify FROM purchase WHERE commodity LIKE CONCAT ( '%',#{commodity},'%' ) AND operator=#{operator}

SELECT purchase_id AS purchaseId, commodity, is_agree AS isAgree, supplier, quantity, amount_money AS amountMoney, payment_method AS paymentMethod, is_pay AS isPay, has_take_goods AS hasTakeGoods, operator, purchase_time AS purchaseTime,classify FROM purchase WHERE supplier LIKE CONCAT ( '%',#{supplier},'%' ) AND operator=#{operator}
